description: Admin efforts for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency
full_summary:
=====================================

### **Application Architect/Programmer Developer**

#### **Tender Reference:** cb-9293-34241366
#### **Original Solicitation Number:** 2024-00292

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Application Programming Services:** The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a contractor to assist in the decommissioning of the current TeamSite Web Content Management System (WCMS) and the implementation of the Drupal Web Content Management System.
*   **Contract Type:** Competitive Selective Tendering
*   **Contract Value:** N/A
*   **Contract Term:** From October 16, 2023, to September 30, 2024

**Contract Information:**

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
*   **Fed/Prov/Terr:** Federal
*   **Type of Procurement:** Selection through a Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Tender Status:** Exired
*   **Federal Supply Classification (FSC) Code:** 8111.1504

**Trade Agreements:**

The procurement is open to contractors who are eligible for the following trade agreements:

*   **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
*   **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
*   **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
*   **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
*   **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

**Contact Information:**

To obtain more information about this procurement, please contact:

*   **Ron Staigh**
    *   Email: [ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (613) 558-5937

Note: The procurement document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/9293/2023-00292-npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/9293/2023-00292-npp.pdf).
